!|script|test query|2|
|show|query|
|$tq=|get fixture|

|define alias|
|my query|query: $tq|

|my query|
|n|2n|
|1|2|
|2|4|

!-TestQuery.cs-!:
{{{using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TestSlim
{
    public class TestQuery
    {
        readonly int _max;

        public TestQuery(int maxNum)
        {
            _max = maxNum;
        }

        internal List<object> Query()
        {
            var rowList = new List<object>();
            for (var i = 1; i <= _max; i++)
            {
                rowList.Add(new List<object> {new List<object> {"n", i}, new List<object> {"2n", 2*i}});
            }
            return rowList;
        }
    }
}
}}}
